cards.name: Black Lotus
cards.text: Adds 3 mana of any single color of your choice to your mana pool, then is discarded. Tapping this artifact can be played as an interrupt.

cards.name: Lightning Bolt
cards.text: Lightning Bolt does 3 damage to one target.

cards.name: Birds of Paradise
cards.text: Flying, Tap to add one mana of any color to your mana pool. This tap may be played as an interrupt.

cards.name: Counterspell
cards.text: Counters target spell as it is being cast.

cards.name: Wrath of God
cards.text: All creatures in play are destroyed and cannot regenerate.

cards.name: Dark Ritual
cards.text: Add 3 black mana to your mana pool.
